MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G77 area of Newton Mearns, affecting properties in Malletsheugh Road and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am due to repairs required to our underground electricity network after third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. Our emergency response team is currently onsite carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:12am on Friday, 29 January 2021
